entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 12:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %

Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 70 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
